version_description:
Changes:
- Added redundant server backend, improving speech recognition and translation speed and accuracy

If you like Vocre, would you mind taking a moment to write a nice review on the App Store? We'd greatly appreciate it. Just tap the heart button inside the app. Thanks for using Vocre!

If you're have any questions or concerns, please contact our support team at support@mylanguage.me

Changes:
- Added redundant server backend, improving speech recognition and translation speed and accuracy

If you like Vocre, would you mind taking a moment to write a nice review on the App Store? We'd greatly appreciate it. Just tap the heart button inside the app. Thanks for using Vocre!

If you're have any questions or concerns, please contact our support team at support@mylanguage.me

Changes:
- Improve translation speed and accuracy
- Updated language libraries based on user feedback
- Increased speed of translation, reduced number of errors!
- Fixed a major bug that was causing translation errors for many users!

If you like Vocre, would you mind taking a moment to write a nice review on the App Store? We'd greatly appreciate it. Just tap the heart button inside the app. Thanks for using Vocre!

If you're have any questions or concerns, please contact our support team at support@vocre.com

If you're have any questions or concerns, please contact our support team at support@vocre.com

"The best things in life are free", so Vocre is now a free app!
Vocre now supports 59 languages (from Catalan to Swahili and many in between). Some languages have more features than others, please check the description and let us know if we should support another language that isn't already listed. Enjoy, and don't hesitate to leave us a review in the app store.
This version is brand new from the ground up and we'd love to hear what you think!
